subject: Re: Big Mistake!
author: Jill
full_text:
Agree 100%, Frank.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  So who certified these "objective" listeners in these supposed tests?
> Everyone hears different, and I doubt having some degree means you get
> perfect hearing. Even everyday stuff like music lyrics, everyone hears
> different, why aren't these skeptics out there keeping people from buying
> records?
> 
>  That's pure BS about trying to save people from wasting money and time. I
> don't know what the motivation is, but I suspect it has more to do with
> science dogma, than pure science. It's like we are all supposed to to get
> some bozo's permission to do our investigations, and research has to be
> approved by some university. I say bite me!
> 
>  I dared to question the motivation and methods of these supposed objective
> scientists and was accused of attacking them, like how dare I even question
> their authority! I'm supposed to supply my equipment for debunking and not
> even ask how it will  be tested, or what qualifies these bozos to test
> anything?
> 
>  I've said all along that you can't take everything from the boxes as
> gospel, and you do in fact hear what you want to hear at times, but these
> pompus jerks act like I'm the one out there fooling everyone.  These science
> dorks want one thing, they want the boxes to go away because it does in fact
> show that there is more to life than the physical and we are in fact more
> that some stupid accident as they would have us believe. There is very
> strong motivation for science to show the box is nothing, as with all things
> paranormal.
> 
>  Why is is ok for them to lie in the name of science!?  When they say "there
> is no evidence" that is a lie!
> 
>  Frank-S
>
